oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Promoting neonatal piglet survival in organic pig production through improved management and housing
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Aagaard-Schild, Sarah-Lina
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Production systems
Health and welfare
Pigs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Planned for next year So far the plan is: To provide access to a shaded/cooled hut Alternatives: Reducing cold stress of piglets during winter E.g. using different quantities (use during winter approx. 40 kg per hut) or lengths of straw Providing access to shaded wallow Providing birth supervision/assistance Obstetric aid, drying of piglets Nursing sows
